data.comment: The big names in today's match at Parc des Princes have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Paris.
In the minute 5, Kylian Mbappe gets his shot on target but fails to score for PSG.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, In Paris PSG attack through Leandro Paredes. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
Frank Schneider awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, Goal! PSG have got their heads in front thanks to a Alessandro Florenzi strike.
Neymar of PSG smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal kick for Angers at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 13, Angers surge into the attack at Parc des Princes but Stephane Bahokenâ€™s header is off-target.
PSG have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for PSG in the half of Angers.
Throw-in for Angers at Parc des Princes.
Throw-in for Angers close to the penalty box.
In the minute 18, PSG needs to be cautious. Angers have an attacking throw-in.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
Frank Schneider awards Angers a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Free kick PSG.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
Angers's Angelo Fulgini gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 26, Frank Schneider awards PSG a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Keylor Navas for PSG who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 30, PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stephane Bahoken (Angers) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Keylor Navas for PSG is back on the field again.
Frank Schneider signals a Angers throw-in in PSG's half.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to PSG.
Free kick for Angers in the half of PSG.
At Parc des Princes, Presnel Kimpembe has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 36, PSG take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Neymar.
Kylian Mbappe with an assist there.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
In the minute 38, In Paris a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pierrick Capelle (Angers) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 41, Free kick for PSG in their own half.
PSG push upfield and Alessandro Florenzi gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Angers defence.
In Paris PSG drive forward through Marco Verratti. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 42, In Paris PSG's Kylian Mbappe is caught offside.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
PSG have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
In Paris, Presnel Kimpembe (PSG) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 45, Angers have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
PSG to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Neymar puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
In the minute 49, Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to PSG.
Throw-in Angers.
In the minute 52, Angers have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Ismael Traore (Angers) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 3-1 at Parc des Princes.
That's a fine assist from Pierrick Capelle.
In the minute 54, PSG drive upfield and Kylian Mbappe gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Angers defender.
Corner awarded to PSG.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 55, Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Julian Draxler extends PSG's lead to 4-1.
In the minute 57, Great play from Mitchel Bakker to set up the goal.
Angers are coming forward and Sada Thioub gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
In the minute 59, Kylian Mbappe for PSG drives towards goal at Parc des Princes. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for PSG at Parc des Princes.
PSG are whistled for offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
In the minute 63, Idrissa Gueye is on a sub for Julian Draxler for PSG.
PSG make their first substitution with Ander Herrera replacing Leandro Paredes.
In the minute 65, Free kick for PSG in their own half.
Corner awarded to Angers.
Angers attack but Mateo Pavlovic's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 67, Frank Schneider awards PSG a goal kick.
The away team replace Stephane Bahoken with Lois Diony.
Jimmy Cabot is replacing Sada Thioub for the away team.
In the minute 69, Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! PSG extend their lead to 5-1 through Idrissa Gueye.
That's a fine assist from Neymar.
In the minute 72, Abdou Diallo is replacing Presnel Kimpembe for the home team.
Colin Dagba is on a sub for Alessandro Florenzi for PSG.
Angers will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from PSG.
In the minute 73, Jimmy Cabot (Angers) has received a yellow card from Frank Schneider.
Angers have a goal kick.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
In the minute 75, Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
Throw-in Angers.
Mauro Icardi (PSG) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 77, Neymar (PSG) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
The away team replace Pierrick Capelle with Thomas Mangani.
In the minute 77, Angers make their fourth substitution with Vincent Manceau replacing Abdoulaye Bamba.
Angers to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Angers in the half of PSG.
Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Angers.
In the minute 82, Stephane Moulin (Angers) is making a fifth substitution, with Mohamed Ali Cho replacing Rayan Ait-Nouri.
Pablo Sarabia is replacing Marco Verratti for the home team.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
Kylian Mbappe puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 6-1.
Pablo Sarabia instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 87, Free kick PSG.
Neymar for PSG gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Angers at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 88, Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Angers.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Paris. The final score is 6-1.
